title: Cardiovascular system pharmaceuticals in Netherlands 2021 | Statista
author: Matej Mikulic; Aug
description: The consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in the Netherlands saw no significant changes in 2021 in comparison to the previous year 2020 and remained at around 455.2 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day.
cleaned_text: Cardiovascular system pharmaceutical consumption in Netherlands 2009-2021 [The consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in the Netherlands saw no significant changes in 2021 in comparison to the previous year 2020 and remained at around 455.2 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day. Still, the consumption reached its highest value in the observed period in 2021.](#statisticContainer) Find more key insights for the consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in countries like
